startTour.title: Welcome
startTour.text: I'm Agent T., and I will guide you through the features of our tic-tac-toe game.

startTour.title: Start your Tour
startTour.text: Click here to start you Tic Tac Toe Tour

startTour.title: Vote on Quine
startTour.text: If you like our project, you can vote for us here. Just click the upvote icon!

startTour.title: Github Repository
startTour.text:
Interested in how this game was built or want to contribute?
Click on the GitHub icon to visit our repository where you can find the source code and project details.

startTour.title: Sound Toggle
startTour.text:
This button lets you toggle the game's sound.
Click here to mute or unmute the game sounds.

startTour.title: Game Header
startTour.text: Here in the game's header section, you can find the game title and access various controls.

startTour.title: Home
startTour.text: This is the Home section. Click here to return to the main page of the game.

startTour.title: How to Play
startTour.text: Click here to learn how to play the game. This section provides detailed instructions and tips.

startTour.title: Developer
startTour.text: This section contains information about the developer behind it.

startTour.title: FAQ
startTour.text: Here you can find answers to frequently asked questions about the game.

startTour.title: Developer Section
startTour.text: This section provides information about the developers involved in the project.

startTour.title: Developer Description
startTour.text: This description gives details about the developer's role and contributions.

startTour.title: FAQ Section
startTour.text: Click on a question to reveal the answer.

startTour.title: FAQ Pagination
startTour.text: Click on a question to reveal the answer.

startTour.title: Over to you
startTour.text:
That's all for now!
Signing off, Agent T.
